predicate.note: Frames file for 'bundle' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 22.3-2.

roleset.name: put items together into a bundle

example.name: banking services
example.text: Instead, they are trying *trace* to build customer loyalty by *trace* bundling their services into packages and targeting them to small segments of the population.

roleset.name: dress warmly

example.name: passive
example.text: ``Ski school is great,'' cries out a tot, bundled in a snowsuit as he plows down a bunny slope.

roleset.note: Two senses might be difficult to distinguish, except 'dressing' sense seems usually occur in the passive?
